fingerprint: Survey 222/1, 111.11 Sq.Yds, Gift Settlement Deed 75/2026, Markondaputti Village, Gramakantam, House No 2-120 in EC but NOT in Deed, Vacant land, Makkuva Mandal
ec_summary: EC shows Gift Settlement 75/2026. House No. 2-120 appears in EC but is NOT mentioned in the pledging deed. This is the residential address of the parties, not a property identifier. Property is vacant Gramakantam land (no buildings). Survey 222/1 correctly matches.
review_notes: L2 accepted with discrepancy note. Report correctly identified that House No. 2-120 in EC is the residential address of the parties (Seedarapu family resides at 2-120), not the property's house number. The vacant land itself has no house number. FI advised to proceed per internal policy. Grama Panchayat certificate attached confirming property details.
exceptions: House number appearing in EC but not in Deed is acceptable when: (1) EC shows party's residential address, not property identifier, (2) Property is vacant land with no assigned house number. Do not flag as mismatch - just note for FI. Varalaxmi vs Varalakshmi spelling variation is acceptable Telugu transliteration.
flow_summary: Seedarapu Venkati (husband, inherited Gramakantam land from father Adhanna) â†’ Seedarapu Varalakshmi (wife) via Gift Settlement 75/2026. Vacant land with no construction. Property acquired by donor through inheritance (pitrarjitam).
